ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:17:30 [Issue ID 4000-106793] urn:comicvine:4000-106793 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:11:12. [Issue ID 337934]
ComicInfo.Summary: Roland is sent out by his father, along with Cuthbert and Alain, to help in the Affiliation's struggle against Farson, the Good Man. Their trip leads to a chance encounter with a failed gunslinger. Meanwhile, Marten bids farewell to Gilead, and the Crimson King sends a gift to an old hag who has plans for the recently orphaned Susan Delgado.
ComicInfo.Tags: Gunslingers,Rhea,Roland Deschain,Alain Johns,Roy Depape,Cuthbert Allgood,Steven Deschain,Randall Flagg,Mid-World,Big Coffin Hunters,Cort,Gilead,Susan Delgado,Clay Reynolds,Eldred Jonas,The Crimson King,Gabrielle Deschain
ComicInfo.Title: Part Two
